General.Name: Amoeba SA
General.Description: Amoéba S.A. produces biological biocides for the elimination of bacterial risk in water and human wounds. The company also offers biocontrol products for plant protection. It also develops applications using the amoeba Willaertia magna C2c Maky formation for plant protection. Amoéba S.A. was founded in 2010 and is based in Chassieu, France.
General.Address: 38 Avenue de FrEres Montgolfier, Chassieu, France, 69680
